Motormaster smacks his head with his hand at the new noise of Squawktalks
voice. He looks to Drag Strip, who looks pretty banged up. "Report" he
barks the order without any emotion. Drag Strip, coasts on the air "well
sir, many Maximals have joined the fray, and we are outnumbered, but their
defences are weak from an attack that's already hapened, this is our
chance". "Good" Smiles Motormaster, "Stunticons, transform and attack.
Squawtalk, Beastbox" he barks tossing out Beastbox, "pick off the
Straglers" at that Motormaster Speedbreaker and Dead-End jump out of
Astroblast, and soar towards the ground, a bit away from the battle.
Astroblast follows them.

The small pink cassette of Beastbox transfroms into his Gorilla mode, but
starts to plummet like a rock, (he cant fly, hint Soulstice).
